Reference

Source: vignettes/reference.Rmd
reference.Rmd
library(iomath)

Conversion to tex 

e <- Ryacas::ysym("((2*Sin(2+x))^2 + (a+b)^2)^3")
e
#> y: ((2*Sin(x+2))^2+(a+b)^2)^3
o <- Ryacas::tex(e)
o
#> [1] "\\left( \\left( 2 \\sin \\left( x + 2\\right) \\right)  ^{2} + \\left( a + b\\right)  ^{2}\\right)  ^{3}"

\[ \left( \left( 2 \sin \left( x + 2\right) \right) ^{2} + \left( a + b\right) ^{2}\right) ^{3} \]

o2 <- hbtex(e)
o2
#> [1] "\\left[ \\left[ 2 \\sin \\left[ x + 2\\right] \\right]  ^{2} + \\left[ a + b\\right]  ^{2}\\right]  ^{3}"

\[ \left[ \left[ 2 \sin \left[ x + 2\right] \right] ^{2} + \left[ a + b\right] ^{2}\right] ^{3} \]

o3 <- btex(e)
o3
#> [1] "\\left\\{\\left[2 \\sin \\left(x + 2\\right)\\right] ^{2} + \\left[a + b\\right] ^{2}\\right\\} ^{3}"

\[ \left\{\left[2 \sin \left(x + 2\right)\right] ^{2} + \left[a + b\right] ^{2}\right\} ^{3} \]

Safe evaluation

safe_eval("2.2", vars = NULL)
#> [1] 2.2
safe_eval("2.2*x^2", vars = list(x = 0.2))
#> [1] 0.088
safe_eval("2,2*x^2", vars = list(x = 0.2))
#> [1] 0.088
safe_eval("2.2; 1.2")
#> [1] 2.2
safe_eval("c(2.2, 1.2)", replace_comma = FALSE)
#> Error in c(2.2, 1.2): could not find function "c"
safe_eval("2,2x^2", vars = list(x = 0.2))
#> Error in parse(text = x2): <text>:1:4: uventet symbol
#> 1: 2.2x
#>        ^

Comparing

grd <- expand.grid(x = seq(-10, 10, length.out = 10))
answer <- Ryacas::ysym("2.2*x^2")
compare_reply_answer(reply = "2.2*x^2", 
                     answer = answer, 
                     compare_grid = grd)
#> [1] TRUE
compare_reply_answer(reply = "2.3*x^2", 
                     answer = answer, 
                     compare_grid = grd)
#> [1] FALSE
m <- matrix(c("2+z^3", "2*sin(x)", "3*y^2", "1.1*x^2"), 2, 2)
m
#>      [,1]       [,2]     
#> [1,] "2+z^3"    "3*y^2"  
#> [2,] "2*sin(x)" "1.1*x^2"
ans <- Ryacas::ysym(m)
ans
#> {{   z^3+2,    3*y^2},
#>  {2*sin(x),  1.1*x^2}}
grd <- expand.grid(x = seq(-10, 10, length.out = 5),
                   y = seq(-10, 10, length.out = 5),
                   z = seq(-10, 10, length.out = 5))
compare_reply_answer(reply = m, 
                     answer = ans, 
                     compare_grid = grd)
#> [1] TRUE
compare_reply_answer(reply = m[1, 1], 
                     answer = ans, 
                     compare_grid = grd)
#> [1] FALSE
m2 <- apply(m, 2, paste0, '+0.1')
m2
#>      [,1]           [,2]         
#> [1,] "2+z^3+0.1"    "3*y^2+0.1"  
#> [2,] "2*sin(x)+0.1" "1.1*x^2+0.1"
compare_reply_answer(reply = m2, 
                     answer = ans, 
                     compare_grid = grd)
#> [1] FALSE
